This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

{{ forecast.date }} {{ forecast.temperatureC }} {{ forecast.temperatureF }} {{ forecast.summary }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-calc-data', templateUrl: './calc-data.component.html' }) export class CalcDataComponent { public forecasts: WeatherForecast[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { var baseUrlExterna = "https://localhost:44365/"; http.get(baseUrlExterna + 'api/WeatherForecast').subscribe(result => { this.forecasts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface WeatherForecast { date: string; temperatureC: number; temperatureF: number; summary: string; }
